caption.p: Differences in endosphere bacterial composition in each E. atherica ecotype. Venn diagram showing the proportion of the endosphere ASVs shared with rhizosphere and soil and exclusively found in inner root in HE ecotype (panel a) and LE ecotype (panel b). Venn diagram showing the proportion of shared endosphere ASVs among elevations (panel c). Mean relative abundance of the core bacterial genera at each elevation (panel d).
